mapper.select: SELECT no, movieNo, memberNo, contents, score, regdate, title, r FROM(SELECT no, movieNo, memberNo, contents, score, regdate, title, rownum r FROM(SELECT r.no, movie_no movieNo, member_no memberNo, r.contents, r.score, r.regdate, m.title FROM reviews r, movies m WHERE r.member_no = #{no} AND m.no = r.movie_no ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT no, memberNo, contents, score, regdate, nickname, r FROM(SELECT no, memberNo, contents, score, regdate, nickname, rownum r FROM(SELECT r.no, r.member_no memberNo, r.contents, r.score, r.regdate, u.nickname FROM movies m, reviews r,members u WHERE m.no = #{no} AND m.no = r.movie_no AND u.no = r.member_no)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews(no, movie_no, member_no, contents, score, regdate) VALUES(reviews_seq.nextval, #{movieNo}, #{memberNo}, #{contents}, #{score}, systimestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(rScore + sScore) FROM(SELECT m.no, NVL(r.score,0) rScore, NVL(s.score,0) sScore FROM movies m, reviews r, surveys s WHERE m.no = r.movie_no(+) AND m.no = s.movie_no(+) AND m.no = #{movieNo})
